Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express and #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: 2 Hyde Park Express, 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, King Dr, Cermak, Michigan, Balbo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#2 Hyde Park Express, #28 Stony Island buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan, Balbo.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses temp. rerouted NB via Lake Park, 47th, King Dr, Cermak to Michigan; SB via  reverse from Balbo/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions.

Northbound buses are rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, and Cermak, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses are rerouted via the same streets, starting after Balbo/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Campbell
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, California, Irving Park, Western, and Montrose due to, street blockage near Montrose/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, California, Irving Park, Western, and Montrose due to, street blockage near Montrose/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump, #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump, 26 South Shore Exp buses are temp. rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Isl, 57th, Hyde Pk, Lake Pk, 47th, King Dr, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump and  #26 South Shore Express buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 57th, Hyde Park, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #134 Stockton/LaSalle Express Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: 134 Stockton/LaSalle Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Wacker, Michigan, LSDr, LaSalle and Stockton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#134 Stockton/LaSalle Express buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Wacker, Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle and Stockton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Skokie/Dempster and Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line service has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line service has been temporarily suspended due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #97 Skokie bus.  

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
